comments:
Selecting Properties... from the popup menu of a breakpoint (either in the 
debugger or the editor) does nothing (in build 200212101456).
Do you have anything in your ".log"?

Yes. It looks like it was a class loading problem. I since had to retart my 
Eclipse and now the dialog works. Could there be a dependency missing from a 
plugin.xml file?
